blog.description: i mainly write teen!readers | REQUESTS CLOSED | masterlist | taglist

summary: Could you do an avengers x teen!reader with “Promise me you’ll take care of yourself.” Where the reader starts to feel depressed...
question: Could you do an avengers x teen!reader with “Promise me you’ll take care of yourself.” Where the reader starts to feel depressed and like they don’t belong and stops eating. Thank you! I love all of your imagines you’re an absolutely amazing writer
answer:
Everyone had their groups in the tower just like at school. You unfortunately fell into the ‘outcast/misfits’ group, not that there really was one. Outcasts sit by themselves and keep to themselves. You didn’t mind being alone but you’d like some company. In every school there’s always the jerks and they decided that since you’re younger than them, they’d tease you. It started out as a joke but everyday it becomes worse, they make you feel so bad about yourself that you’ve considered just ending it all. But they’ve suggested it and you kind of wanted to prove them wrong. You’ve got some fight in you but not enough to rid of them.

Yesterday had been the worse day yet. You’ve started to lose hope, you’re not sure what to do. There’s so much school stress but on top of that there’s the feeling of not being good enough. You’re not overweight but you’re not skinny either. Like Steve says, “You’re just the right amount, you don’t need to be some skinny chick, you’re perfect the way you are.” You believed that for about a month but then those jerks started to pick on you for your weight. You had tried to stand up to them but it did nothing. They laughed while they spat insulting things about your weight to you. You started to believe them. In the mornings, you can’t help but stare at your body. The insults rolling around in your mind.

You’ve started to skip breakfast, they usually cook something that’s unhealthy so you figured that it would be better to not eat breakfast. Although, you grab an apple and eat that on the way to school. You’ve started skipping lunch at the cafeteria too. Steve and Tony, the dads of the tower, have noticed how you’ve started to slim down and stop eating. You’re not as happy and cheerful as you used to be. They tried to get Nat to talk to you but you wouldn’t even let her into your room. The team got together and tried to figure out a plan to help you, but you didn’t want their help no matter how much you pleaded for help in your eyes. The sadness and loss of hope. They hate seeing you like this. You’re a ghost of your former self.

You grab an apple and start to walk to school, but Steve runs up in front of you and stops you. You pause yourself right before you take a bite of your apple. You raise an eyebrow at him. “Can I talk to you?” He says calmly but he shows a hint of worry.

“I have to get to school.”

“Yeah, it won’t be long, I promise.” He says as he guides you back into the kitchen where everyone is seated. “Listen, we’ve noticed that you’ve been changing a lot lately and some of your changes aren’t…-“

“Healthy,” Clint pipes up. “Listen, kid. I’ve got kids, I know when somethings up and if the whole team can see that then there’s clearly something big that’s affecting you. We just want the best for you, just let us in and we can help.”

They know.

You break down, everything that you’ve been pushing to the back of head thinking that this was your own decision breaks through. You drop your bag and apple, holding your face in your hands. How did you let it get this bad without telling them? How did you think that you could do this on your own? You should have told them, they always comfort you. You feel their familiar warmth engulf you. Someone rubs your back and some tell you that it’s going to be okay, while the rest just let you feel their comfort.

“I’m sorry I didn’t tell you guys, I thought that it was what I wanted, I thought this was the only way,” you cry.

“There’s always another way, and we’ll help you through it. You tell us what you want and we’ll do our best to help you,” Steve calmly states. You nod your head understanding.

“Promise me you’ll take care of yourself from now on,” Tony pauses and looks to the group then to you. “Promise us you’ll take care of yourself.” He looks you in the eyes. He’s a little teary-eyed.

“I promise, I promise to take care of myself. Thank you for helping too. I don’t know where I would be without you guys. Thank you.” You hold onto as many avengers as you could, giving them all of your love, but keeping some for yourself not wanting to break the promise.

summary: What if Avengers 4 ends with the Next Avengers aka the children of the OG avengers
body:
What if Avengers 4 ends with the Next Avengers aka the children of the OG avengers

James Rogers - Son of Captain America & Black Widow

Tournn - Daughter of Thor


Azari - Son of Black Panther


Francis Barton - Son of Clint Barton (I know in the movie Clint’s sons are Cooper and Nathaniel)


AND


Henry Pym, Jr. - Son of Giant Man (Ant-Man) & the Wasp {this makes more sense if it’s Cassie Lang: Scott Lang’s daughter, but maybe Scott and Hope Van Dyne will have a baby of their own} [originally Henry is the son of the original Ant-Man and Wasp - Hank Pym and Janet Van Dyne]


Possibly: Morgan Stark - Son or daughter of Iron Man and Pepper Potts

summary: Monster
title: Monster
body:
“Have you ever asked yourself, do monsters make war, or does war make monsters?”

Five

I was right for thinking I’d hate the malt machine. I was forced to follow another waiter around on my first day and make mental notes about what I was doing. Now I was required to hand out plates…

Read more…

Captain Marvel: Sorry I'm late guys I'll try my best to help out! We can do this!! [smiles encouragingly]
Thanos: [instantly blinded by the pureness]

dialogue.phrase: Sorry I'm late guys I'll try my best to help out! We can do this!! [smiles encouragingly]

blog.name: lokiwriting
blog.title: Tony Stark outshines the stars
blog.description: A mess of prompts and ideas and stories

summary: “You would think that even villains would have at least some holiday cheer,” Tony said, wincing as Bruce wrapped a bandage...
body:
“You would think that even villains would have at least some holiday cheer,” Tony said, wincing as Bruce wrapped a bandage around his hand.

    “Could you imagine, though? If villains actually liked holidays? I don’t know about you, but fighting Doombots in Santa costumes…” Clint said.

    Loki snorted. “Next time we fight someone, I’m replacing their outfit with full Santa getups.”

    “Finally, a cause I can get behind,” Tony said. No more SHIELD- from now one we are part of SHOV, aka Santa Hats On Villian.”

    “Could you imagine, though? If villains actually liked holidays? I don’t know about you, but fighting Doombots in Santa costumes…” Clint said.

    Loki snorted. “Next time we fight someone, I’m replacing their outfit with full Santa getups.”

    “Finally, a cause I can get behind,” Tony said. No more SHIELD- from now one we are part of SHOV, aka Santa Hats On Villian.”

blog.name: tonystarksintern
blog.description: "I think you end up doing the stuff you were supposed to do at the time you were supposed to do it." - Robert Downey Jr.

summary: I never wrote, I mean anything fiction related but here I’m so that I can make you smile with my stupid post to tell you how...
body:
I never wrote, I mean anything fiction related but here I’m so that I can make you smile with my stupid post to tell you how amazing you are❤️ @keep-a-bucket-full-of-stars

—————

*Peter comes running to the lab calling for tony*.

Pete- Tony Tony tony ….

Tony- Slow down Kiddo, Care to tell why you’re radiating so much tension?


Peter- We have to do something, my Friend Leah is feeling sad. We have to make her Happy.


Tony- *ruffling spiderling’s perfectly gelled hair to let few curls loose and opens his phone*

Peter- Stooop! We have emergency to deal.

Tony- Done, Video sent, Emergency solved. Let’s check with Leah now?

Peter - No No No what did you do

Somwhere, Leah receives a Gif of Peter playing with his curls 😜

——————————-

I know this is lame, it’s just an attempt to make you feel better like you make us with your amazing stories ❤️🤗

blog.name: tonystarkficrecs
blog.title: Tony Stark Fic Recs
blog.description: Simply put, I love fics revolving around Tony Stark. Star ratings are my opinion only! If you liked a fic, make sure you leave them kudos/comments! Rec requests are currently closed.

summary: hiii your blog is amazing!! do you know fics where steve is like tony childhood hero or teenage crush anything like this??...
question: hiii your blog is amazing!! do you know fics where steve is like tony childhood hero or teenage crush anything like this?? thanks anyway :)
answer:
I’m glad to hear you like the blog!! Steve being Tony’s childhood hero/crush is a semi-common trope I’ve seen around so I probably missed a few I’ve read, but here are some of the ones I remember reading and enjoying!


Proof Positive by MegaraNoelle

★ ★ ★ ★ ★

Words: 372,271 (series)

Pairing: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark

Completed: No (individual works in series are all completed, last checked 9/20/18)

Tony is no stranger to paternity claims from his female conquests, there’s a system in place for them. But when one of the tests actually comes back positive, he makes a rash decision to not tell anyone about it, not even Pepper Potts. All Mary Parker wants is for Tony to spend a little time with their son. Tony has a lot to think about in his life now, how he wants to run his company, how his life is going to change with the arc reactor, and what he’s going to do about his son, Peter. Then, the Avengers Initiative pops up, and in waltzes his childhood hero, and enemy, Captain America.

Follows the lives of the Starks, Parkers, and Rogers’, as they grow up, and grow in life.


The Twice-Told Tale by arysteia

★ ★ ★ ★ ★

Words: 15,789

Pairing: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark

Completed: Yes

For someone he’d hero-worshipped for so long, Steve Rogers in the flesh is a pretty big disappointment. For one thing, he keeps looking at Tony as though he reminds him of someone else, and even if he never says anything, Tony’s pretty sure it’s his father. A lifetime of not measuring up to Howard’s expectations is more than enough, thank you very much, and he’s certainly not going to make an effort to live up to any of Steve’s. Steve’s pretty clearly failed to live up to his expectations, in any case, and that’s not hypocritical at all.


I Started a Joke by Naferty

★ ★ ★ ★ ★

Words: 102,755

Pairing: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark

Completed: Yes

“Tony?“

“Who the hell is Tony?”


My Son, My Sun by Wordsplat

★ ★ ★ ★ ★

Words: 70,151

Pairing: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark; Tony Stark & Peter Parker

Completed: Yes

Just before the events of Iron Man, a baby is left on Tony’s doorstep. He wants nothing to do with it at first, but his time in Afghanistan changes his mind and Tony vows to become a better man for his son’s sake.


hold the things you wanna say by SailorChibi

★ ★ ★ ★

Words: 6,316

Pairing: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark

Completed: Yes

Tony is still a consultant, and between SI, the team and SHIELD he’s overworked and exhausted. That’s okay.

He and Steve have been having sex for weeks but that’s all it is, just sex, and Tony wants more but he’ll never get it and that’s okay. Really.

What’s not okay is the fact that Howard Stark has somehow appeared in the future and is the same as always.

This is definitely going to fuck up his schedule.


Childhood is the Kingdom Where Nobody Dies by MemoryDragon

★ ★ ★ ★

Words: 31,765

Pairing: Gen

Completed: Yes

Seven-year-old Tony Stark wakes up on a Hydra base, lost, afraid, and alone. He has to overcome his fears before it’s too late for the Avengers and Captain America.


I Said “I Love You,” What Does it Matter if I Lie to You? by Lelantus

★ ★ ★ ★

Words: 95,225

Pairing: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark

Completed: Yes

18 year old Tony Stark is your typical teenager. Well, except for how he’s the playboy billionaire heir to Stark Industries and working on two PhDs. Oh, and 6 months ago he was kidnapped by - well, no one really knows who. Since his rescue (excuse you, Tony liberated himself), he’s also been keeping a pretty big secret. Here’s a hint: it’s shiny, red and gold, and flies. Tony’s had a productive couple of months, but the fact that his grandfather keeps trying to hire bodyguards for his “safety” is really putting a cramp in his ability to keep his secret superhero identity, well, a secret.

Steve Rogers wakes up in 2015 and finds out that he’s missed 70 years (Oh god, does this mean he’s 94?), a revelation that he handles with much less grace than usual. Mostly, Steve just wants to be Captain America again, but on his own terms and without a lot of fanfare. To fill the time while Steve tries to figure out the best way to resurrect a dead superhero, his good friend Isaac Stark offers him a job: bodyguard to Isaac’s grandson, Tony Stark - who seems to get into a surprising amount of trouble for a teenager. “There’s no better introduction to the 21st century than through Tony,” says Isaac. Somehow, Steve is not reassured.


Semaphore by DevilDoll

★ ★ ★

Words: 40,040

Pairing: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark

Completed: Yes

“I’m trying to like you, Tony. You’re just making it very hard.”


Twice Upon a Time by TsaritsaElena

★ ★ ★

Words: 70,436

Pairing: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark

Completed: Yes

Tony Stark has never had an easy relationship with his father, but when Howard Stark circa 1983 time travels to the future in a freak accident, things get even more complicated, especially since Tony is dating his dad’s idol, Captain America, and Howard doesn’t know. As they work toward a solution that will restore Howard to his own timeline, will Tony get a second chance at a father-son relationship with his dad, or is he in for more of the same unforgiving treatment from Howard? Time travel, Avengers missions, and a secret project of Howard’s: things at Stark Tower are about to get a little crazy.
